articles.author: Patrick George
articles.title: The Ford Capri Is Already Catching Shade From Polestar's CEO - InsideEVs
articles.description: Polestar CEO Thomas Ingenlath had something to say about Ford's newest EV.
articles.content: This morning, I had to double-check whether the InsideEVs CMS was working properly. That's because when I went to edit a story about the new electric 2025 Ford Capri, I was convinced that I was looki… [+2278 chars]
